section.title: Acknowledgments and Thanks
section.para: Thanks to everyone that gave comments as I was writing this. This includes David Lawyer, Deb Richardson, Daniel Barlow, Greg Ferguson, Mark Craig and other members of the discuss@en.tldp.org list. Some sections I got from the HOWTO Index and the sgmltools documentation. The sections on network access to CVS was partially written by Sergiusz Pawlowicz (ser@metalab.unc.edu). Sections on DocBook were written by Jorge Godoy (godoy@conectiva.com). A great deal of thanks to both of them for their help.
